TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit TaskHelpers extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Helpers for awaiting Tasks and other things that implement IAwaiter or IAwaiter<T>.
Docs.remarks: These helpers may also be useful for other languages that do not support the await keyword. Do note that this API surface is also available on .NET 4 and some PCL profiles.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task Await (System.Threading.Tasks.IAwaiter a, Action f);
.method public static class System.Threading.Tasks.Task Await(class System.Threading.Tasks.IAwaiter a, class System.Action f) cil managed

Docs.param: The awaiter to use.
The code to execute once the await finishes successfully.
Docs.summary: Await the awaitable linked to the provided awaiter using the given functions.
Docs.returns: A new task representing the await.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task Await (System.Threading.Tasks.Task t, Action f);
.method public static class System.Threading.Tasks.Task Await(class System.Threading.Tasks.Task t, class System.Action f) cil managed

Docs.param: The task to await.
The code to execute once the task finishes successfully.
Docs.summary: Await the given task using the given functions.
Docs.returns: A new task representing the await.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task Await (System.Threading.Tasks.IAwaiter a, Action f, Action fin);
.method public static class System.Threading.Tasks.Task Await(class System.Threading.Tasks.IAwaiter a, class System.Action f, class System.Action fin) cil managed

Docs.param: The awaiter to use.
The code to execute once the await finishes successfully.
The code to execute after the await is ready regardless of the await's success/failure.
Docs.summary: Await the awaitable linked to the provided awaiter using the given functions.
Docs.returns: A new task representing the await.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task Completed ();
.method public static class System.Threading.Tasks.Task Completed() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a completed task that has no result.
Docs.returns: An already compelete Task.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task FromError (Exception exception);
.method public static class System.Threading.Tasks.Task FromError(class System.Exception exception) cil managed

Docs.param: The exception to package into a Task.
Docs.summary: Returns an error task. The task is Completed, IsCanceled = False, IsFaulted = True.
Docs.returns: A completed faulted Task with the specified error set.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task<TResult> FromError<TResult> (Exception exception);
.method public static class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<!!TResult> FromError<TResult>(class System.Exception exception) cil managed

Docs.typeparam: The result type desired for the returned Task.
Docs.param: The exception to package into a Task<TResult>.
Docs.summary: Returns an error task of the given type. The task is Completed, IsCanceled = False, IsFaulted = True.
Docs.returns: A completed faulted Task<TResult> with the specified error set.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task<TResult> FromResult<TResult> (TResult result);
.method public static class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<!!TResult> FromResult<TResult>(!!TResult result) cil managed

Docs.typeparam: The result type desired for the returned Task.
Docs.param: The value to package into a Task<TResult>.
Docs.summary: Returns an completed task of the given type with the given result value.
Docs.returns: A completed Task<TResult> with the specified result.
Docs.remarks: Note that this method is only defined on .NET 4 and some of the supported PCL profiles. For .NET 4.5, ASP.NET vNext on Desktop/Core CLR and the other supported profiles use the FromResult<TResult> hanging off the Task class. This method is therefore a polyfill for profiles that do not provide it.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task<object> NullResult ();
.method public static class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<object> NullResult() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a Task with a null result.
Docs.returns: A Task<object> with null as the result.
